snippet.title: Apex Legends: Hunted Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Vantage’s mother may have raised her to survive the wilds of Págos, but she never crossed paths with a Legend. With her squadmates' help, she’ll need to discover the will to survive.

http://x.ea.com/73911

Apex Legends™ is a free-to-play hero shooter  game where legendary characters battle for glory, fame, and fortune on the fringes of the Frontier. Play for free now on PlayStation® 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC via Origin and Steam.

Check out our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/playapex.
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/playapex.
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playapex/.

CREDITS
Production Company: Electronic Arts & Psyop 
Sound Design and Mix: Barking Owl Inc.
All other categories: Electronic Arts & Respawn Entertainment

#ApexLegendsHunted #ApexHunted #ApexLegends
